availability.message: Open to freelance and co-op opportunities or just to chat

posts.title: My New Now Page!
posts.body: I'ts a new year, a new semester, and with that, I figure I'd update my site and put the final layer of polish on it. I figure a little lens into my life with this page would be the perfect thing to add. Anyways, as I keep updating this I hope that you'll enjoy it and get to know me a little better.
